fields.name: ApiKeys
fields.about: The APIs supported by the broker.

fields.name: ThrottleTimeMs
fields.about: The duration in milliseconds for which the request was throttled due to a quota violation, or zero if the request did not violate any quota.

fields.name: MinVersion
fields.about: The minimum supported version for the feature.

fields.name: MaxVersion
fields.about: The maximum supported version for the feature.

fields.name: FinalizedFeaturesEpoch
fields.about: The monotonically increasing epoch for the finalized features information. Valid values are >= 0. A value of -1 is special and represents unknown epoch.

fields.name: FinalizedFeatures
fields.about: List of cluster-wide finalized features. The information is valid only if FinalizedFeaturesEpoch >= 0.

fields.name: MaxVersionLevel
fields.about: The cluster-wide finalized max version level for the feature.

fields.name: MinVersionLevel
fields.about: The cluster-wide finalized min version level for the feature.
